Package purchasable.monsters

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
purchasable.Purchasable
purchasable.monsters.Monster
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasImage
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dinosaur, Skeleton, Slime, Snake, UndeadGuard, Zombie
public abstract class Monster extends Purchasable
An abstract Monster class that contains all the attributes and methods for all Monster types.
Author:
Bede Nathan, Celia Allen

  • Field Details

    • armorModifier

      public static int armorModifier
      Attribute armorModifier, of type static integer. Modifies the amount of damage dealt to a monster when wearing armor.

    • Monster

      Main constructor for the abstract superclass of Monster
      Parameters:
      name - , of type String. Sets the name
      maxHealth - , of type integer. Sets the maximum health
      attackAmount - , of type integer. Sets the base attack damage
      speed - , of type integer. Sets the base speed (determines attack order)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Custom toString method for the class Monster. Returns a string of the monster's type, health, attack amount and speed, each on a new line.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
